column4: hi. my usb pen drive doesn't get recognized by ubuntu. but the red LED on it is on
it's a 1 GB pen drive btw
Was plugged in when  you did sudo fdisk -l ?
What type of device is it?
no info on it about that, I got it from a company
and ... unlug it  and plug it back in while watching  tail -f /var/log/messages
it just showed this all the time: http://pastebin.com/BJz4p7rr
